member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION
member.summary: These flags identify the type of resource that will be viewed as a render target.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Do not use this value, as it will cause to fail.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_BUFFER
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a buffer.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1D
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 1D texture.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1DARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 1D textures.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D textures.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMS
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture with multisampling.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMSARRAY
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D textures with multisampling.

member.name: D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION.D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE3D
member.summary: The resource will be accessed as a 3D texture.
